SEARCH
Package Controller

Class PlayerControllerTest

java.lang.Object
Controller.PlayerControllerTest
public class PlayerControllerTest extends Object
The type Player controller test for the new map. This class contains unit tests to verify the functionality of the PlayerController class. It ensures correct assignment of countries, continents, armies, and validation of deploy orders.
